channel.title: tts on vim, git, aws and other three-letter words
channel.description: Recent content in tts on vim, git, aws and other three-letter words

item.title: Vue CLI Service Build Out of Memory Error
item.description: Solving the frontend build out-of-memory error If you encounter an out-of-memory error during the frontend build, you can increase the memory limit for the node process by setting the NODE_OPTIONS environment variable: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 npm run build -- --mode production Note that it should be enough to build the frontend application with the default memory limit. Increasing the limit is a temporary measure to be able to profile and debug the build process.

item.title: Google Colab notebook - input and output, OpenAI TTS API
item.description: Running OpenAI TTS API in Google Colab The example below runs OpenAI TTS API in a Google Colab notebook. The process involves some input and output: Prompt the user for API key Run the API method Save result into a file I have a notebook with two cells. First: Setup cell # @title Notebook Setup # @markdown Please, run this cell first. You'll be prompted for your OpenAI API Keys. # @markdown https://platform.
